#summary Listing of all model initialization functions.
#labels chapter,0.8

These functions are called from the `init` function of your model files.

==Example==

`models/Author.cfc`:

{{{
<cffunction name="init">
  <cfset hasMany("posts")>
</cffunction>
}}}

==Functions==

 * [afterCreate afterCreate()]
 * [afterDelete afterDelete()]
 * [afterSave afterSave()]
 * [afterUpdate afterUpdate()] 
 * [afterValidation afterValidation()]
 * [afterValidationOnCreate afterValidationOnCreate()]
 * [afterValidationOnUpdate afterValidationOnUpdate()]
 * [beforeCreate beforeCreate()]
 * [beforeDelete beforeDelete()]
 * [beforeSave beforeSave()]
 * [beforeUpdate beforeUpdate()]
 * [beforeValidation beforeValidation()]
 * [beforeValidationOnCreate beforeValidationOnCreate()]
 * [beforeValidationOnUpdate beforeValidationOnUpdate()]
 * [belongsTo belongsTo()]
 * [disableSoftDeletion disableSoftDeletion()]
 * [disableTimeStamping disableTimeStamping()]
 * [hasMany hasMany()]
 * [hasOne hasOne()]
 * [property property()]
 * [SetSoftDeleteColumn SetSoftDeleteColumn()]
 * [SetTimeStampColumns SetTimeStampColumns()]
 * [table table()]
 * [validate validate()]
 * [validateOnCreate validateOnCreate()]
 * [validateOnUpdate validateOnUpdate()]
 * [validatesConfirmationOf validatesConfirmationOf()]
 * [validatesExclusionOf validatesExclusionOf()]
 * [validatesFormatOf validatesFormatOf()]
 * [validatesInclusionOf validatesInclusionOf()]
 * [validatesLengthOf validatesLengthOf()]
 * [validatesNumericalityOf validatesNumericalityOf()]
 * [validatesPresenceOf validatesPresenceOf()]
 * [validatesUniquenessOf validatesUniquenessOf()]
